AUTOMATED BACKUP

Conveniently back up all your wallets to the cloud and decrypt them with a single master password. Replace the hassle of managing numerous secret phrases with the convenience and security of a single custom password. (You can still opt to manually manage your individual seed phrases).

CUSTOMIZABLE FEES

You decide the network fee. Up the fee for faster network confirmations. Lower it when you're not in a rush. Bitcoin.com takes ZERO fees (you pay only to use the public blockchain networks).

LOW-FEE CHAINS

The multichain [Bitcoin.com](http://Bitcoin.com) Wallet is committed to giving you access to low-fee public blockchains so that you can use peer-to-peer cash as it was intended AND make the most of the opportunities available in the web3 space. 

AVALANCHE SUPPORT
Now you can buy, sell, swap, hold and manage AVAX, the native token of the Avalanche blockchain. 

SHARED WALLETS (MULTI-SIG)

WIDGETS

MARKETS VIEW
Track the price action and get key info on the top cryptocurrencies.

PERSONAL NOTES

Add text to your transactions to remind you who sent what, when, and where.

SEND VIA SOCIAL

For BCH, thanks to low network fees and near-instant confirmation time, you can send a payment link (aka "Sharable Link") to anyone using any channel (eg. Messenger, SMS, email, Whatsapp, and so on.). Funds are received/claimed instantly with just one click.

INSTANTPAY

Set your spending threshold, then scan a QR code with the request amount set on the recipient's device. Your payment will complete in an instant (BCH only).

DISCOVER

Use the Discover section in the app to locate merchants near you who accept cryptocurrency payments in-store. Browse websites where you can checkout with crypto and find other cool features like games, gift cards, and more.

CUSTOMIZABLE DISPLAY CURRENCY

Choose your preferred display currency alongside your crypto (eg. USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, CAD, AUD, and more).

ORGANIZE YOUR HOLDINGS

Create any number of wallets to organize your funds as you see fit. Drag and drop to re-order your wallets, and hide wallet balances that you don't want prying eyes to see.

AUDITED BY KUDELSKI SECURITY

A comprehensive 2022 audit from the renowned cybersecurity experts proved there is no real-world scenario in which an attacker would be able to compromise a user’s private keys.

The FAB Mobile app puts the power of the bank in your hand. Spend, save and stay on top of your everyday banking from just about anywhere. 

DOWNLOAD. REGISTER. DONE!
If you’re a FAB customer or using the app on a new device, here’s how you can get started once you download the app:
•	Tap ‘Already a customer’ and enter your credit or debit card number or customer number
•	Tap and scan your Emirates ID
•	Do the face scan as prompted – to ensure that only you have access to your account
•	You’re done! Now you can start banking anywhere, anytime.   
 
NEW CUSTOMER? NO PROBLEM!
Start your journey with FAB right from your living room. Simply download the app and open an account, get a credit card or get approved for a personal loan – without stepping into a branch. You only need an Emirates ID. 
 
YOUR MONEY. YOUR WAY.
We know you value your time, so we’ve made sure you can do a whole lot of your banking, whenever you want. Here are some of things you can do:
•	View your balance and e-statements
•	Activate your card
•	Pay your utility bills
•	Get an Easy Payment Plan 
•	Sign up for Islamic accounts
•	Earn and redeem FAB Rewards
•	Start an iSave and enjoy a higher rate of interest
•	Upload your account documents – passport, visa, Emirates ID
•	Login with Fingerprint or Face ID
•	Locate your nearest FAB branch or ATM
•	Enjoy free and instant transfers to India, Pakistan, Sri Lanka and Philippines 
•	Enjoy exciting offers and exclusive discounts

AlipayHK provides diversified mobile payment services to users. With AlipayHK, users can enjoy different payment services, offers and value-added services, that makes life easier and more convenient.

The Wide Coverage of AlipayHK’s Payment Services: 
AlipayHK covers over 100,000 merchants, including physical and online outlets of local retail shops, convenience stores, supermarkets, wet market stalls, restaurants, eCommerce platforms, and a variety of online services and experiences, including food delivery and digital entertainment, etc. In addition, AlipayHK’s cross-border payment service is now accepted by almost all physical stores in the Chinese mainland, around 90% of merchants in Macao and popular shopping areas in Japan. AlipayHK users can enjoy preferential exchange rates for cross-border payments in these locations.

Travelling around the City at Ease with Just One App:
Being the first mobile wallet that introduces QR code payment across MTR (heavy rail network), AlipayHK’s public transport payment network currently covers taxi, Kowloon Motor Bus (KMB), Citybus, New World First Bus (NWFB), Long Win Bus (LWB), New Lantao Bus (NLB), as well as selected green minibus and ferry routes. AlipayHK is expected to gradually extend its coverage to include Hong Kong Tramways soon.

A Variety of Value-added Services and Offers:
AlipayHK covers a wide array of bill payment services, including government bills, electricity, gas, mobile service, broadband service, pay television and education center tuition fees, etc.
In addition to the extensive payment network, AlipayHK also offers services and benefits beyond payment. Users can collect different types of coupons and earn stamps on purchases within the app. With AlipayHK, users can enjoy Payment + Living with just one app!

Collect Consumption Vouchers with AlipayHK:
In 2022, the new round of consumption voucher will be disbursed automatically to the same AlipayHK account that was successfully registered for the consumption voucher in 2021. No re-registration is required.

For more details about AlipayHK, please visit: https://www.alipayhk.com

summary.label:
This is the App that will help you plan your personal finances, and save you a lot of time too! 

Remember, every month, spending hours with a spreadsheet - inputting your bills and wages then trying to work out if you have any money left?  This App replaces your spreadsheet and every month you can update in seconds.

We take a slightly different approach to most.  Most Budget Apps show you a list of your Bill payments and Money received then tells you the difference

However the Budget Planning App takes details of all your income, bills and expenses and then, once you have input your current bank balance, shows you what your bank balance will be over the months ahead.  

+  Update your bank balance and you budget is updated. 
+  Input expense details once and say if they are Monthly, Weekly or Annual, we take care of the rest.
+  Warning if you go into your over draft. (Balance is Amber)
+  Warning if you will go over drawn (Balance in Red)
+  Share your budget across IOS devices *
+  See a monthly summary if your income and outgoings. *

Want to buy that laptop or purse?  Enter it into your budget to see how it effects your balance over the month.

A couple of Tips:
+  To delete a payment - From the Payment Screen Swipe left on your payment.
+  To Edit a payment in your budget - press on the payment to edit the amount, payment date or mark the payment as already paid!

Enjoy!!
